markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Athletic Rush](/Spells.aspx?ID=1818)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 377 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Domain**
[Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

Your body fills with physical power and skill. You gain a +10- foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks. As a part of Casting this Spell, you can use a Stride, [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81), [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), or [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39) action. The spell's bonuses apply during that action.
name: Athletic Rush

summary_markdown: Your body fills with physical power and skill.
text: Athletic Rush Single Action Source Player Core pg. 377 2.0 Domain Might Duration 1 round --- Your body fills with physical power and skill. You gain a +10- foot status bonus to Speed and a +2 status bonus to Athletics checks. As a part of Casting this Spell, you can use a Stride, Leap, Climb, or Swim action. The spell's bonuses apply during that action.
